contexts.context: ...but is instinctively understood and accepted by the Dunmer as an <mark>integral</mark> part of Vivec's divine aspect. A more complete appreciation of...
.../poetic truths); Mephala is understood paradoxically to contain and <mark>integrate</mark> these contradictory themes. And all these subtle undercurrents and contradictions...
...of my own welfare, I passively acquiesced in my gradual <mark>integration</mark> into the affairs of Clan Aundae. I made no human...
